quotes.quote: Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.
It's better to be healthy alone than sick with someone else.
Hope is important because it can make the present moment less difficult to bear. If we believe that tomorrow will be better, we can bear a hardship today.
Excellence is the gradual result of always striving to do better.
It's better to be unhappy alone than unhappy with someone - so far.
Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without.
The power for creating a better future is contained in the present moment: You create a good future by creating a good present.
Perhaps it is better to be irresponsible and right, than to be responsible and wrong.
You can't have a better tomorrow if you are thinking about yesterday all the time.
It's a never ending battle of making your cars better and also trying to be better yourself.
You have to be able to accept failure to get better.
Be yourself, but always your better self.
Silence is better than unmeaning words.
It's better to look ahead and prepare, than to look back and regret.
Always render more and better service than is expected of you, no matter what your task may be.
Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius, and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
Be kind, don't judge, and have respect for others. If we can all do this, the world would be a better place. The point is to teach this to the next generation.
It is nice to have valid competition; it pushes you to do better.
I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past, â€” so good night!
It is better to be alone than in bad company.
Positive Anything Is Better Than Negative Nothing.
Better than a thousand hollow words, is one word that brings peace.
Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
Leadership is unlocking people's potential to become better.
Life is too short to worry about anything. You had better enjoy it because the next day promises nothing.
Leadership is a privilege to better the lives of others. It is not an opportunity to satisfy personal greed.
I think that's the single best piece of advice: constantly think about how you could be doing things better and questioning yourself.
It is better to be feared than loved, if you cannot be both.
It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
Fitness is not about being better than someone else. It's about being better than you used to be.
Without change there is no innovation, creativity, or incentive for improvement. Those who initiate change will have a better opportunity to manage the change that is inevitable.
Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
Don't gain the world and lose your soul; Wisdom is better than silver and gold.
One man practicing sportsmanship is far better than a hundred teaching it.
Everyone looks so much better when they smile.
We have always held to the hope, the belief, the conviction that there is a better life, a better world, beyond the horizon.
You don't get older, you get better.
Better three hours too soon than a minute too late.
It is better to keep your mouth closed and let people think you are a fool than to open it and remove all doubt.
It is only through labor and painful effort, by grim energy and resolute courage, that we move on to better things.
It's better to be a lion for a day than a sheep all your life.
Well done is better than well said.
Better to fight for something than live for nothing.
It is better to light a candle than curse the darkness.
For every good reason there is to lie, there is a better reason to tell the truth.
The more man meditates upon good thoughts the better will be his world and the world at large.
The secret to success is good leadership, and good leadership is all about making the lives of your team members or workers better.
Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
